imagine applying some sort of a heatmap to the footage so that it highlights movement ðŸ‘€
@Redire that is actually really easy in resolve
kai is explained it and i genuinely like
but yeah here's the trick to see motion: take the footage, duplicate it, invert the top one and set it to 50% opacity, then shift it by a couple frames
you can use it to mask out stuff that is constantly moving
so like someone walking in front of a wall, masking that can take hours
but with this i takes like a minute
only works if you have an otherwise perfectly still shot tho
or you can stabilize the footage
